description:
The “little wretch” she bullied and abused is the main character in the book, who will become a cold-blooded powerful regent. She on the other hand, is the villainous wife that the hero has to marry, she is the villain’s white moonlight in the book, whose end is not so good. She must die to keep the plot from falling apart. Bully him till the point he can’t take it anymore and pushes her off a cliff and then her mission shall be over and she couldn’t return back. But then, something went wrong. Nian Nian glances towards the rising hatred value and then at the man who is desperately trying to hold her at the edge of the cliff with a puzzled look: If he hates her so much, why doesn’t he let her die?

Nian Nian: Let go!

The man’s eyes were red, and he almost crushed her wrist with the force of his grip.

Nian Nian: Wake up, I’m the villainess. Death is the only way for me to recognize my wrong-doings.>
